description:
This is an HP WebOS guide to accompany you on your visit to NYC.

It contains an OFFLINE database of maps and descriptions of what we believe are the must see and must do sights of New York City.  

The database is completely offline to avoid you incurring roaming charges while travelling abroad.

Should you require further details or directions, a link to the location of the sight is provided which will open up in the google maps application.

GPS location services are used to calculate the distance and direction to the closest item

Please don't hessitate in contacting us should you have recommendations to make.

Best regards meanwhile and have a great holiday!
Cheers,
John
versionNote:
This is now identical to the Plus version.
If you like it you can consider contributing to its upkeep by buying it.
